subtitle: karanī sưksā Bān Sadō̜kkēt Tō̜. Khōksawāng ʻŌ̜. Samrōng Čhō̜. ʻUbon Rātchathānī
title: Kānčhatkān phūmpanyā thō̜ngthin

description.value: Study on local wisdom management, tradition, and social conditions in Ban Sadokket Village, Ubon Ratchathani Province, Northeastern Thailand.

notes.value:
Microfiche. Jakarta : Library of Congress Office ; Washington, D.C. : Library of Congress Photoduplication Service, 2009. 1 microfiche. Master microform held by: DLC.

In Thai, with summary in English.
